def C(n, r):
    if(n<r):
        return 0
    if(r==0):
        return 1
    if(r==1):
        return n
    if(r>n/2):
        return C(n, n-r)
    else:
        res = 1
        for i in xrange(0, r):
            res*=(n-i)
            res/=(i+1)
        return res%1000000007

li=list()
for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n, r = map(int, raw_input().split())
    li.append(C(n, r))
for i in li:
    print i
